hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah reported the Messenger of Allah (May peace be upon him) as saying; one is considered to be at prayer so long as one is detained by prayer:Nothing prevents one from going home to one’s family except prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي فَضْلِ الْقُعُودِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
chapter.eng-name: The Virtue Of Sitting In The Masjid
